# Test File for Chunk Conversion

This is a test file with unconverted chunk options to demonstrate the `convert_chunk_options.R` script.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r my-plot, fig.cap="A sample plot", fig.width=8, fig.height=6}
plot(1:10)
```

```{r data-table, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
knitr::kable(head(mtcars))
```

```{r another-figure, fig.cap="Another figure", fig.alt="Alt text here", warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, hp)) + geom_point()
```

```{r}
# This chunk is already simple - no conversion needed
1 + 1
```

# This one just has a label - no conversion needed
